lines.text: The werewolf is neither man nor wolf, but a Satanic creature with the worst qualities of both.
Thanks... Thanks for the bullet. It was the only way... In a few moments now... I shall know why all this had to be. Lisa... good bye. Good bye Lisa. I'm sorry I... I couldn't have made you happier.
Are you a single gentleman, sir?
Singularly single, madame. More single than I ever realized that it was possible for a human being to be.

[to Wilfred]
It's Lisa. Don't you know me. Lisa.
You are foolish, but without fools there would be no wisdom.
Good day. But remember this Dr. Glendon, the werewolf instinctively seeks to kill the thing it loves best.
